title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3802/92 of 23 December 1992 concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3802/92
of 23 December 1992
concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The good described in column 1 of the  annexed table are now classified within the combined nomenclature under the appropriate CN code  indicated in column 2 of the said table.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the  21st day after its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member  States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 December 1992. For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the  Commission
